identity.mission: Build an AI-Powered Climate Risk & Sustainability Platform that blends scientific precision with sci-fi HUD aesthetics.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Climate Science + Cyberpunk HUD.
Emotion First: Urgency (Red) vs. Hope (Neon Green).
Content is King: Data must be legible but beautiful.
Zoom In: Focus on specific regions/risks.
Negative Space: Don't clutter the map; use collapsible panels.

headings.usage: All section titles, dashboard widget headers, big metrics.

typography.installation: Import 'Rajdhani' and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css.

cards.classes: bg-[#0D121F]/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-[#00E0FF]/20 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,224,255,0.1)] rounded-xl

buttons.primary: bg-[#00FF94] text-black hover:bg-[#00FF94]/80 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]
buttons.secondary: border border-[#00E0FF] text-[#00E0FF] hover:bg-[#00E0FF]/10 uppercase tracking-wider rounded-none

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border border-white/10 focus:border-[#00FF94] text-white rounded-md

map_overlays.style: Floating HUD panels with semi-transparent backgrounds and neon borders.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle 'scanline' or 'grid' overlay to the background using CSS patterns.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for active risk alerts.
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone) or Lucide React. Use 'Thin' or 'Light' weights for a technical look.

images.description: Satellite view of Earth from space, dark and sci-fi.
Dark moody aerial view of flood waters.
Cracked earth desert landscape under storm.
Wind turbines at night, green energy concept.

libraries.charts: Recharts (customized with neon strokes and dark backgrounds)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add @import for Rajdhani and JetBrains Mono in index.css immediately.
2. OVERRIDE THEME: Replace all CSS variables in index.css with the 'Eco-Cyberpunk' palette provided above.
3. MAP FIRST: The Dashboard must be map-centric. The map should take up 60-70% of the screen real estate.
4. HUD UI: Build the 'Risk Panel' and 'Chat Panel' as floating glass overlays on top of the map or in a tight grid around it.
5. VOICE AI: Implement the Web Speech API with a visual 'Audio Waveform' visualizer when active.
6. AUTH: Create a 'Holographic' login form with the satellite background.
7. SCENARIO SIMULATOR: Use sliders that change the map layer opacity or color intensity instantly.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark Mode Only: Do not implement a light mode toggle. This is a mission-critical dashboard.
Micro-Interactions: Every button hover should feel 'electric'.
Data-Test-IDs: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
